not_supported: Windows server details is not supported yet.

index.title: Servers
index.description: You can manage your servers connected to Liman Center Management System through this page.

create_type.title: Resource Type Selection
create_type.description: Select the type of resource you want to add to Liman Center Management System.

server.title: Server
server.description: Add your traditional physical or virtual servers

kubernetes.title: Kubernetes
kubernetes.description: Add your Kubernetes deployment as a managable service to Liman

create_server.title: Add Server
create_server.description: You can add your Windows and Linux servers that you have already installed to Liman Center Management System.

create.title: Add Server
create.description: You can add your Windows and Linux servers that you have already installed to Liman Center Management System.

validation.ip_address: Server address cannot be left blank.

port.max: Connection port cannot be longer than 5 characters.
port.nonempty: Connection port cannot be left blank.

ip_address.label: Your Server's Address
ip_address.information: Enter the IP address or hostname of the server you want to connect to.

general_settings.name: General Settings
general_settings.description: Select the server name and operating system.

validation.name: Server name cannot be left blank.

sname.label: Server Name
sname.information: Write the server name you want to appear.

key_selection.name: Key Selection
key_selection.description: Select a key type to connect to your server.

key_inputs.name: Key
key_inputs.description: Provide a key to connect to your server.

username.label: Username
username.information: Provide a username for {{key_type}} connection type.

password.label: Password
password.information: Provide a password for {{key_type}} connection type.

shared.label: Shared
shared.information: If you want the key you entered for {{key_type}} connection type to be used by all users, check this box.

summary.name: Summary
summary.description: Check and confirm your server information.

errors.validation: Please check your input before proceeding.
errors.error: An error occurred while creating the server.

create_kubernetes.title: Add Kubernetes Service
create_kubernetes.description: Add and manage your Kubernetes service in Liman.

namespace_deployment.name: Namespace & Deployment
namespace_deployment.description: Select namespace and deployment for desired service.
namespace_deployment.title: Namespace and Deployment Selection

service_name.label: Service Name
service_name.placeholder: Enter the service name to display in Liman
service_name.information: Custom name for the service to be displayed in Liman

namespace.label: Namespace
namespace.information: Select the namespace where your Kubernetes deployment is located.

deployment.label: Deployment
deployment.information: Select the deployment you want to manage.

summary.name: Summary
summary.description: Check and confirm your Kubernetes information.

kubeconfig.title: Kubeconfig
kubeconfig.label: Kubeconfig
kubeconfig.description: Upload kubeconfig file to access your Kubernetes cluster.
kubeconfig.drag_drop_text: Drag and drop file here or

errors.validation: Please check your input before proceeding.
errors.error: An error occurred while creating the Kubernetes service.

system_status.name: Server Name
system_status.disk_status_desc: Disk usage status of mounted disks

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.description: You can manage the extensions used on your server through this page.
extensions.name: Extension Name

toasts.assign: The selected extensions have been successfully assigned to the server.
toasts.unassign: The selected extensions have been successfully unassigned from the server.

unassign.title: Are you sure?
unassign.description: This action cannot be undone. The selected extensions will be removed from the server. Do you want to continue?

assign.title: Add Extension
assign.description: You can add an extension to your server using this window.
assign.name: Extension Name

page_header.title: Extension Settings
page_header.description: You can manage the mandatory and advanced settings that the extension requires through this page.

card.obligatory_settings_p: Settings that must be entered for the extension to work.
card.advanced_settings_p: Settings that are not mandatory but change the way the extension works.

settings.no_need_settings: The extension does not require any settings.

toast.title: Successful
toast.description: Operation requests have been successfully delivered to the server.

page_header.title: Services
page_header.description: You can perform operations such as starting and stopping services running on your server through this page.

alert_dialog.title: Are you sure?
alert_dialog.description: This service operation cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?

services.dialog_description: The service details for the service are as follows.

page_header.title: Access Logs
page_header.description: You can view and examine the last 500 requests made to your server through this page.

dialog.title: Access Log Details
dialog.description: You can view the detailed content of the access log.

page_header.title: Open Ports
page_header.description: You can view the active ports broadcasting on your server and the active process managing that port through this page.

packages.upload_description: You can upload your packages with .deb and .rpm extensions from this section.
packages.upload_success: Your package upload request has been received. You can track the live status through the page.

page_header.title: Packages
page_header.description: You can manage and add new packages installed on your server through this page.

update.title: Updates | Liman
update.p: You can view and perform update operations for updates on your server through this page.

page_header.title: Local Groups
page_header.description: You can view the local groups available on your server, add new ones, and add members to groups through this page.

form_message.min: Group name must be at least 2 characters.
form_message.max: Group name must be at most 50 characters.

fail.title: Error
fail.description: An error occurred while creating the local group.

dialog.title: Create Local Group
dialog.description: This operation will create a local group on your system.

page_header.title: Local Users
page_header.description: You can view the local users available on your server and add new ones through this page.

username.min: Username must be at least 2 characters.
username.max: Username must be at most 50 characters.

password.min: Password must be at least 8 characters.
password.max: Password must be at most 50 characters.

fail.title: Error
fail.description: An error occurred while creating the local user.

dialog.title: Create Local User
dialog.description: This operation will create a local user on your system.

fail.title: Error
fail.description: An error occurred while deleting the authorized user.

fail.title: Error
fail.description: An error occurred while adding the authorized user.

page_header.title: Authorized Users
page_header.description: You can view the authorized user permissions available on your server and perform add and remove operations.

alert_dialog.title: Are you sure?
alert_dialog.description: This operation cannot be undone. The selected authorized users will be removed from the server. Do you want to continue?

form_message.min: Username must be at least 2 characters.
form_message.max: Username must be at most 50 characters.

dialog.title: Create Authorized User
dialog.description: This operation will create an authorized user on your system.
